content:
The CG IG contains an Extension with valueRelatedArtifact. Currently this throws the following error during build:
Publishing Content Failed: Unable to find the source file for StructureDefinition/RelatedArtifact: not specified, so tried StructureDefinition-RelatedArtifact.xml,
Do we need to include a special fhir package for the metadatatypes?
nope. Error was on our side. Had to fix the pages which included a wrong link.
